attributes.action: Change the law  restricting Muslims to marrying one partner at a time.
attributes.background: Change the law making all future marriages monogamous

rejection.details:
We are not sure what specific action you are asking the Government or Parliament to take on this subject. Polygamy is illegal in the UK.

You can find out more about the law here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN05051
